items.name: restrict_type
items.title: Apply Restrictions On
items.tooltip: This determines restrictions rule to be applied on selected category or all categories of the event

items.name: restrict_in_category
items.title: Select Categories
items.tooltip: Set the restrictions based on the selected ticket categories

items.name: total_submisssion
items.title: Total Tickets Per Day
items.tooltip: Set the total number of tickets a user is allowed to create in EasyDiscuss per day.
